name: Cute Hentai Waifu - Numbers
description:
Game Play:

"Cute Hentai Waifu - Numbers" is a casual puzzle game with a 4x4 tile size and 2048 style. Move tiles and try to complete 2048!!
You can unlock and enjoy CG in the gallery by completing the game or achieving specific tiles to collect hearts.

Remedies are also available for those who find the puzzle game difficult!
(Pay attention to the tooltips that appear in the bottom left corner of the screen during the game!)



Game Features:

• 12 CGs with some variations.

• Relaxing music with a simple puzzle.

• Gallery mode supported.
